text: Razak (or Razzak Khan) (1953/1954 - 1 June 2016) was an Indian movie and television actor who was in Bollywood movies. He was known for his roles in Baadshah, Hello Brother and in Akhiyon Se Goli Maare. Khan died of a heart attack at his home in Bandra, Maharashtra on 1 June 2016, aged 62. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Razak Khan Bio at the Bollywood Hungama Category:1950s births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors
title: Razak Khan
